definition: thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anatomic relations of the thoracic pedicles to the spinal nerve roots.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸椎弓根与毗邻的神经的解剖关系。

sentences.english: Gordon listed the high position of the spine, thoracic, lumbar What are?
sentences.chinese: 高姿登列出的脊椎，胸椎，腰椎病都有哪些？

sentences.english: Anatomic study of the thoracic pedicle morphology in the immature spine is lacking.
sentences.chinese: 对未成年人胸椎椎弓根的解剖学研究暂未报道。

sentences.english: Thoracic myelopathy in a patient with alkaptonuria has not been previously reported.
sentences.chinese: 之前尚无尿黑酸尿病人合并胸椎脊髓病的报道。

sentences.english: One option is to extend cervical implants into the upper thoracic vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一种选择是将颈椎植入装置延伸至胸椎上。

sentences.english: Youthful carcasses will have cartilaginous caps on the thoracic vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的胴体在胸椎骨上有软骨盖。

sentences.english: Multi-vertebral characters of Mongolia sheep has a feature of parental imprinting.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古羊胸椎数的遗传方式具有亲本印记特征。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical efficacy of surgical management for upper thoracic vertebral tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨和评价上胸椎椎体结核的外科治疗的方法。

sentences.english: Objective Discuss clinical value of treatment of thoracic vertebra fracture though anterior approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨前路治疗胸椎骨折的疗效。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
